name: WP-xPerts Popular Posts
author: Sajid Hussain

sections.description:
Display Most popular posts or most viewed posts on your blog using widget in sidebar.
Plugin offers a wide range of settings to customize the layout of your widget.
Plugin also supports custom post types

Layout Options

  • select post type
  • give number of posts to show
  • show/hide thumbnail
  • thumbnail position top/left
  • show/hide post author
  • show/hide post date
  • show/hide post tags
  • show/hide post categories
  • show/hide post number of views
  • show/hide number of views
  • editable VIEWS text
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->Popular Posts to manage layout.
  4. Go to Appearance->Widgets , use WP-xPerst Popular Posts Widget
sections.changelog:
1.1

  • Support added for custom post type
  • Now you can select from post type available
